alert.note: Alert for Andrews (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 11:07PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Andrews County through 1130 PM CDT... At 1107 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 18 miles west of Andrews, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Andrews, Florey, Frankel City and Andrews County Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
